language_elements.name: terms-changed-description
language_elements.value:
Procelio's terms of use have changed and required additional agreement to play the game.

See <link="%PRIVACY%"><color=blue>Privacy Policy</color></link>
See <link="%TOS%"><color=blue>Terms of Service</color></link>

Do you agree to the above-linked documents?

language_elements.name: loading-error-accountstate-description
language_elements.value: Unable to download account server state

language_elements.name: loading-error-cullbots-description
language_elements.value: Unable to download AI bot files

language_elements.name: conn-files-failed-description
language_elements.value: Unable to connect to files server

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-noagreement-description
language_elements.value: You must agree to the terms of use to play Procelio

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-pwtoolong-description
language_elements.value: Password too long. Please limit to 128 characters/bytes

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-pwtooshort-description
language_elements.value: Password too short. Must be at least 8 characters long

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-usertoolong-description
language_elements.value: Username too long. May be at most 28 characters

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-userbad-description
language_elements.value: Username may only contain valid ASCII graphical characters

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-bademail-description
language_elements.value:
A valid email is required for password recovery
(Disposable addresses permitted, at user's risk of account loss)

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-server-description
language_elements.value: Internal server error (go yell at devs)

language_elements.name: inv-tooltip-stats
language_elements.value:
Health: %hp
Shield: %shield
Mass: %mass
Complexity: %cplx
Ranking: %rank
Cost: %val
Cost(Premium): %prem
Thrust: %trst
Rotation(deg/s): %rots
Damage: %dmg

language_elements.name: block-alpha_1x2core-desc
language_elements.value: The control and power core of a robot. Any blocks disconnected from it are destroyed, and if no functional components remain you die

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitecube-desc
language_elements.value: Your generic 6-sided chassis block, allowing connectivity and damage flow on all sides

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whiteinner-desc
language_elements.value: A truncated chassis cube: the same connectivity at lower weight

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whiteprism-desc
language_elements.value: A prism-shaped chassis piece. Used for aesthetics or for its lower weight

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitetetra-desc
language_elements.value: A small lightweight chassis component, often used for routing connectivity and damage flow

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitepyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A square-bottom variant of the tetra

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavycube-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis cube

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavyinner-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis inner

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavyprism-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis prism

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavytetra-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis tetra

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glasscube-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis cube

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glassinner-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis inner

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glassprism-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis prism

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glasstetra-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis tetra

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight4-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight6-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_angled3-desc
language_elements.value: An angled lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_angled5-desc
language_elements.value: An angled lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_tjunction3-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight split rod featuring connections on each end

language_elements.name: block-alpha_lasergun_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A simple gun that shoots where you aim it. Hitscan.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_thruster_t1-desc
language_elements.value: A small and simple thruster that can apply force in the placed direction

language_elements.name: block-alpha_topmount_thruster-desc
language_elements.value: A small and simple thruster, attached directly to a robot for increased power output

language_elements.name: block-alpha_thruster_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A large and powerful thruster that can apply force in the placed direction

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wheel_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A wheel. Does wheel things. Can steer

language_elements.name: block-alpha_nonsteering_wheel-desc
language_elements.value: A wheel. Does wheel things. Can't steer

language_elements.name: block-alpha_hoverblade_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A powerful fan providing movement within a small distance from the ground

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_swept_l-desc
language_elements.value: A swept wing: stable, high lift, higher drag (left)

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_swept_r-desc
language_elements.value: A swept wing: stable, high lift, higher drag (right)

language_elements.name: block-alpha_railgun-desc
language_elements.value: A long-distance, high velocity sniper gun

language_elements.name: block-alpha_plasmacannon-desc
language_elements.value: Launches an explosive cansiter of high-temperature plasma

language_elements.name: block-alpha_nanoassembler-desc
language_elements.value: Emits a beam of nanobots to repair allied bots

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_energyblade-desc
language_elements.value: Cuts into enemy bots as a melee attack

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_minelayer-desc
language_elements.value: Drops a mine onto the ground which, after activating, will detonate when other bots approach

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_shieldprojector-desc
language_elements.value: Projects an energy shield to block incoming projectiles

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_smokescreen-desc
language_elements.value: When triggered, emits a cloud of smoke around your bot

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_a_l-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_a_r-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_b_l-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_b_r-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_c-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage

language_elements.name: block-helium_112-desc
language_elements.value: A small tank of lighter-than-air gas

language_elements.name: block-helium_335-desc
language_elements.value: A large tank of lighter-than-air gas

language_elements.name: block-helium_348-desc
language_elements.value: A massive tank of lighter-than-air gas

language_elements.name: block-alpha_radar_jammer-desc
language_elements.value: Counteracts the effects of enemy radar for your bot

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-maxcpu
language_elements.value: Placement would exceed maximum complexity limits

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-noblocks
language_elements.value: No more blocks of that type

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-archetype
language_elements.value: Component incompatible with parts already on bot

language_elements.name: robot-validate-error-zerocore
language_elements.value: Robot does not have a core

language_elements.name: matchmaking-failed-body
language_elements.value: An unknown error occurred. Please try again. If the error persists, let devs know.

language_elements.name: paint-premiumonly-body
language_elements.value: Custom paint palettes only available with Procelio Premium

language_elements.name: i-accept-the-terms-of-usage-and-privacy-policy
language_elements.value: I accept the terms of usage & privacy policy

language_elements.name: techtree-wip-desc
language_elements.value:
The Osprey modular hardware research and development department is being researched...
and developed. come back later!
